Key Match Events: Ross Adair smashed a century to lead the Irish batting efforts
Graham Hume then starred with a three-wicket haul
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Ireland's first T20 tournament after the disappointing World Cup campaign
Others: Ireland pulled off a superb 10-run win over South Africa, their first against the Proteas in T20 internationals
South Africa captain Aiden Markram won the toss and decided to bowl first against Ireland
